rules_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a permanent with mana value 3 or less.
Gain control of target nonland permanent until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“We find your willingness to cooperate promising. I can assure you, we will find time for your goals as well.”
—Sesilius, Chosen Speaker[/i]
